  • public interface BattleshipModel
    Interface for Battleship Model

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayMode

        PlayMode getPlayMode()
        Returns the player that is currently on the offensive
        Returns:
        the playMode enum state of the current game.

      • setPlayMode

        PlayMode setPlayMode(PlayMode playMode)
        Sets the play mode from setup to battle and back
        Parameters:
        playMode - The Playmode enum value being assigned.
        Returns:
        the play mode that was implemented

      • getActivePlayer

        Player getActivePlayer()
        Returns the player that is currently on the offensive
        Returns:
        the player that is currently active

      • isSetupMode

        boolean isSetupMode()
        Returns:
        true is game is in setup mode, false in playmode.

      • setActivePlayer

        void setActivePlayer(Player player)
        Sets the specified player for offensive play
        Parameters:
        player - Player being set to offense.

      • resetGame

        void resetGame()
        resets the gameboard, ships and counters. Starts new game in SetUp mode.

      • getPlayerBoard

        Board getPlayerBoard(Player player)
        Returns specified players Board object
        Parameters:
        player - Player's board to be returned
        Returns:
        current state of board from specified player

      • placeShip

        boolean placeShip(Player player,
                Ship ship,
                Location head,
                Location tail)
        Returns true if a ship is succefully placed on the board
        Parameters:
        player - Player performing placement
        ship - Ship being placed
        head - Starting Location of ship
        tail - Ending Location of ship
        Returns:
        true if the ship is succefully placed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ship placement is not legal.

      • getShipLocations

        Location[] getShipLocations(Player player,
                          ShipType ship)
        Returns an array of Locations currently occupied by the ship.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who owns the ship being queried
        ship - ShipType enum value of type of ship requested
        Returns:
        an array of Locations the ship occupies.

      • makeShot

        ShotResult makeShot(Player player,
                  Location target)
        Returns the result of the shot fired by the specified player, i.e. hit or miss
        Parameters:
        player - Player firing shot
        target - Location of attack
        Returns:
        the resuld of the shot fired by the specified player at the specified location

      • getWinner

        Player getWinner()
        Method to return a winner once game is over.
        Returns:
        Player object of winning player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when there is no winner

      • isGameOver

        boolean isGameOver()
        Method to test for a win condition.
        Returns:
        True if win condition met, false if no win condition met.
